idea:
We are INSTRUCARE & SOLUTIONS, based in Mumbai striving to serve our customers to best of our abilities.

We emphasize strongly on assisting our customers in any way we can and hence setup a firm which brings sales & Service under one roof.

We undertake third party service contracts of all the instruments that you need in your laboratory running at their optimum capacity and accuracy. We also possess a complete know how of water systems for your laboratory having installed and serviced water systems of various specifications and capacities.


We specialize in manufacturing following laboratory instruments

pH/ Conductivity Meter

Autoclave

Hot Air Oven / frezers/ Refrigerator

Serological Water Bath

Water Still

Muffle Furnace

BOD Incubator

Deep Freezer/ Cooling Chamber

Magnetic Stirrer- (Single-Multi Point)

Laminar Air Flow

UltraSonic Cleaner

Lab Water System (Type II Water)

Vacuum Oven

Hot Plate / Heating Mantle

Fume Hood / BIOSAFETY Cabinets/ Laminar air flow

Water Bath / Oil Bath

Constant Temperature Oil Bath

Bacteriological Incubator
name: INSTRUCARE & SOLUTIONS

idea: A ENGINEERING COMPANY WAS DOING OUT SOURCING BY SECURING FABRICATION ORDERS, WISH TO PUT OWN MANUFACTURING FACILITY
name: ABHINAVHA ENGG.FAB LLP

idea:
Dear Sir,

Greetings from Leo Infra Development Private Limited.

We are pleased to introduce ourselves as M/s Leo Infra Development Private Limited, having our corporate office at 416, Platinum Techno Park, Sector 30A, Vashi, Navi Mumbai – 400 703. We undertake Liasioning, consultancy and outsourcing contracts for Real Estate Developers, Contractors, Sub-Contractors, Government authorities, etc. we also deal in scrap material consisting of ferrous and non-ferrous metals, papers, plastic, etc. We have our warehouse established in the Uttar-shiv area near Kalyan Shilphata to ensure the swift movement of materials from the outskirts of the city.

We have Mr. Ashish Jaswantrai Mehta at the helm to oversee and control the Liasioning, Consultancy as well as Metal scrap business. Mr. Mehta comes with an experience of more than two decades in varied fields including Automotive Sector, Real Estate, and Metal Recycling. Projects worth more than 100 Crores in value are effectively handled and completed by him from the perspective of Government / Statutory approvals. Business contracts come-in seamlessly with his level of contacts and connections with Government Decision Makers and Influencers and Administrators.

The Metal scrap trading business is very well established for the past couple of years (under a different company and brand) and presently the same is also consolidated under this entity. The Metal scrap industry is mainly controlled through the informal sector which has minimal contributions to the economy as well as the industry. We, on the other hand, are a team of professionals, operating in the industry through a structured and law adhering framework. Sourcing of our materials is done through various corporates, government agencies, local markets – mainly formal. We have our network of business associates at Pan India level and are capable of material pick up throughout the entire territorial boundaries of India. With the growing scarcity of natural resources and growing awareness about correct methods of disposal and environment-friendly options of re-using the old waste, channeling the end-of-life scrap materials to correct recyclers is surely a big business opportunity in the current decade. We are proud to be part of the wave right from the very beginning.

We look forward to an opportunity to be part of your esteemed organization in the near future.

Thank you!
name: LEO INFRA DEVELOPMENT PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
ABOUT FUNSOLAR


A movement to spread awareness for, and increase accessibility to solar technology.
We’ve developed a range of civil products to generate awareness,
a portal to easily get quotes from several rooftop
system installers, and
a range of personal products to bring solar tech into more hands.
All our products and the rooftop portal are made in India.
name: FUNSOLAR
